definitions.definition: To consider or cause to be considered from a global perspective ; to consider as a global whole , rather than making or focusing on national or other distinctions ; compare globalize .
To make real ; to make worldly .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To consider or cause to be considered from a global perspective ; to consider as a global whole , rather than making or focusing on national or other distinctions ; compare globalize .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To make real ; to make worldly .
